channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘In their last days, our parents changed their will’: They left me $250,000, but gave my sister $1 million. What should I do?
item.description: “How many people maintain a relationship with their siblings after their parents died?”

item.title: 51 seconds to breach: How CISOs are countering AI-driven, lightning-fast deepfake, vishing and social engineering attacks
item.description: Attackers can breach a network in 51 seconds. CISOs fight back with zero-trust, AI-based threat detection & instant session token revocation.

item.title: The risks of AI-generated code are real — here’s how enterprises can manage the risk
item.description: AI generated code is set to dominate application development. Here's what enterprises can do now to lower the risk.

item.title: ‘It’s been a scary ride’: My family has $800K in stocks. We lost 2 years of market gains in a few weeks. Do we sell — or buy?
item.description: “I’m considering encouraging my family to liquidate part of their real-estate holdings to further invest in equities.”

item.description: Marey enables filmmakers to create using storyboards, sketches, and even live-action references, making it more intuitive for pros.

item.title: Oil edges higher as tighter U.S. sanctions on Iran, Russia may disrupt global supplies
item.description: Oil futures inched higher on Friday, as news of tighter U.S. sanctions on Iran and Russia had the potential to disrupt global crude supplies.

item.title: Nvidia’s GTC keynote will emphasize AI over gaming
item.description: Don't expect to hear a lot about better framerates and raytracing at the Nvidia GTC keynote. AI will instead be the subject of the day.

item.title: This could be Tesla’s next plan to recoup China market share
item.description: Tesla has lost share to Chinese competitors, while Elon Musk’s political activities have led to steep declines in Tesla sales in Europe.
